summary: 调用ModifyRouteEntry修改自定义路由条目的名称和描述。

schema.description:
路由条目所在的地域ID。

您可以通过调用[DescribeRegions](~~36063~~)接口获取地域ID。

路由条目的名称。

名称长度为1～128个字符，不能以`http://`或`https://`开头。

路由条目的描述。

描述长度为1～256个字符，不能以`http://`或`https://`开头。

schema.title: 新路由条目下一跳类型
schema.description:
新路由条目下一跳类型。取值如下：
- **NetworkInterface**：弹性网卡。
- **NatGateway**：NAT网关。

schema.title: 新路由条目下一跳实例ID
schema.description: 新路由条目下一跳实例ID。

400.errorMessage: Specified RouteEntry name is not valid.
The operation is not allowed because of route entry is managed.
The operation is not allowed because the type of route table is not permitted.
Normal nat gateways do not support modifying the next hop of the route.
The route type does not support modifying the next hop of the route.
The specified routetable does not exist.
The specified network interface does not exist.
The operation is not allowed because the nexthop already exists.
The current region does not support the function of modifying the route next hop.
Some route entry status blocked this operation.
The vSwitch where the specified networkinterface is located does not exist.

403.errorMessage: User not authorized to operate on the specified resource.

404.errorMessage: The specific NAT gateway is not found.
The specified resource of %s is not found.

title: 修改自定义路由条目的名称和描述
description: **ModifyRouteEntry**接口不支持并发修改同一个自定义路由条目的名称和描述。
